metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17097 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The WavFileBase class in WavFile.cpp in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free) orpossibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by SoundStretch.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17097` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsoundtouch1 - 2.1.2+ds1-1
soundstretch - 2.1.2+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.2+ds1-1').
